languages.text: "Помнишь, как в шпиле Опустошительной бури меня обуяла ярость? Ты не пытал{mf|ся|ась} утишить ее, наоборот — приветствовал{mf||а}. И тогда приветствовать ее начал и я".
"Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."
languages.original_text: "Помнишь, как в шпиле Опустошительной бури меня обуяла ярость? Ты не пытал{mf|ся|ась} утишить ее, наоборот — приветствовал{mf||а}. И тогда приветствовать ее начал и я".

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¿Recuerda cuando me vi abrumado por la ira en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora? No intento apagarla, sino que se entregó a ella. Y en ese mismo momento yo también empecé a aceptarla».
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."

traits.locale_text: «¿Recuerda cuando me vi abrumado por la ira en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora? No intento apagarla, sino que se entregó a ella. Y en ese mismo momento yo también empecé a aceptarla».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你还记得我在狂风尖塔里被愤怒冲昏头脑的时候吗？你没有打算抑制它，相反，你接受了它。自那时起，我也开始去接受它。”
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."

traits.locale_text: “你还记得我在狂风尖塔里被愤怒冲昏头脑的时候吗？你没有打算抑制它，相反，你接受了它。自那时起，我也开始去接受它。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔で俺が怒りに飲み込まれた時のことを覚えているか？あんたはそれを抑えつけようとするどころか、受け入れてくれた。あの時、俺も怒りを受け入れ始めたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."

traits.locale_text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔で俺が怒りに飲み込まれた時のことを覚えているか？あんたはそれを抑えつけようとするどころか、受け入れてくれた。あの時、俺も怒りを受け入れ始めたんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Vous vous souvenez quand la colère m'a submergé, dans la flèche de la Tempête ravageuse ? Vous n'avez pas cherché à me calmer, bien au contraire. Vous avez suivi le mouvement. Et c'est à ce moment-là que j'ai commencé à l'accepter à mon tour. »
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous souvenez quand la colère m'a submergé, dans la flèche de la Tempête ravageuse ? Vous n'avez pas cherché à me calmer, bien au contraire. Vous avez suivi le mouvement. Et c'est à ce moment-là que j'ai commencé à l'accepter à mon tour. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch noch, wie ich im Turm des plündernden Sturms vom Zorn übermannt wurde? Ihr habt nicht versucht, ihn zu dämpfen. Im Gegenteil, Ihr habt ihn angenommen. Und da habe auch ich begonnen, ihn anzunehmen."
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch noch, wie ich im Turm des plündernden Sturms vom Zorn übermannt wurde? Ihr habt nicht versucht, ihn zu dämpfen. Im Gegenteil, Ihr habt ihn angenommen. Und da habe auch ich begonnen, ihn anzunehmen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."

languages.text: "Müfteris Kasırga kulesinde öfkeme yenildiğim anı hatırlıyor musun? Beni sakinleştirmeye çalışmamış, tam tersine öfkemi kucaklamıştın. İşte o an ben de onu kucaklamaya başladım."
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire? You did not try to dampen it — on the contrary, you embraced it. And that was when I began to embrace it too."

traits.locale_text: "Müfteris Kasırga kulesinde öfkeme yenildiğim anı hatırlıyor musun? Beni sakinleştirmeye çalışmamıştın, tam tersine öfkemi kucaklamıştın. İşte ben de o zaman onu kucaklamaya başladım."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
